name: Test Drive 2018
description:
A racing game where you can't steer!

EDIT:

We were just to late with our slight balance patch that improves the level slightly. If you want to enjoy that version try the following version:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/14L5V5R8L0KLn52DngPl6EJn3MxXU2LGm/view?usp=shari...

CONTROLS:  

Left mouse click: Hold and drag crates and barrels

HINT(S):  
Don't touch the land mines!
